thread.section_title: PhysioRoom.com Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of www.physioroom.com | 2 of 903
thread.title: Claudia

author: Claudia
title: Claudia
text: I am always skeptical about buying things for injuries on line as you never know whether they will do what they say they will do. I can only say that I am so pleased that this time, the experience was just great. I purchased both the shoulder support strap, as I was just recovering from a frozen shoulder, and as I was also recuperating from knee surgery I also purchased the Elite Elastic Knee Support. I am really pleased, and my order came quickly. Thank you so much.
